description: I think it's a nice app... I have started to have serious doubts about VLC and privacy as sometimes it connects home without your notice to deliver your privacy...so this app might do me well if Only it can handle subtitles...I don't know

description: This is the only video downloader that has consistently worked for me. Tried many in Windows and none worked well. This is the only one I've found in linux.
ich finde es blöd, dass die Anwendung nach der Installation nicht funktioniert. Vielleicht muss man noch was zusätzlich installieren?
